project.name: Codeprimate Extensions
project.description: This is the parent project to all Codeprimate Extensions, which provides extensions to various 3rd-party Java libraries and frameworks commonly used to build applications in Java. Additionally, Extensions provides integrations between other Codeprimate projects, such as Elements, alongside 3rd-party Java libraries and frameworks. These integrations will most likely occur as Adapters to the underlying library or framework.
